rules.text: No uncurated news bots posting. If you want to see statuses from a newspaper or something like that, check out https://feedsin.space to setup an RSS->fediverse account.
No untagged nudity, pornography and sexually explicit content
No untagged gore and extremely graphic violence
No stalking or harassment of other users
Do not use bots to abuse other people. Punch up, not down
Respect the standards of the fediverse. If a human would likely add CW to a post, a bot should also add a CW.

Your signup request must include the magic word!

The magic word is.... spreadsheet
No mirrors of someone else's Twitter accounts. If they want to be here, they can create their own account.
No interactions with people who don't opt in to the interaction. If you mention another user, they must either follow the bot, or they must've started the interaction themselves.

No bots that use ChatGPT, OpenAI or the other big GPT systems. If you're running your own LLM, that's ok. If you think you have a special use case to use a GPT system, feel free to ask if you can make a bot here, but chances are the answer will be no.
